Sylph/Core/Any.h

00001 /* 
00002  * File:   Any.h
00003  * Author: frank
00004  *
00005  * Created on 22 maart 2009, 16:40
00006  */
00007 
00008 #ifndef ANY_H_
00009 #define ANY_H_
00010 
00011 #include "Object.h"
00012 #include "Exception.h"
00013 #include "Primitives.h"
00014 
00015 #include <typeinfo>
00016 
00017 SYLPH_BEGIN_NAMESPACE
00018 
00019 template<class T>
00020 class Array;
00021 class String;
00022 class Dictionary;
00023 SYLPH_PUBLIC
00024 class Any : public virtual Object {
00025     template<class T> friend T & any_cast(Any & any);
00026 public:
00027 
00028     Any() : content(NULL) {}
00029     template<class T>
00030     Any(const T & value) : content(new AnyContainer<T>(value)) {}
00031     Any(const Any & other) : content(other.content ?
00032           other.content->clone() : 0) {}
00033     ~Any() { delete content; }
00034 
00035     bool empty() { return !content; }
00036     const std::type_info & type() const {
00037         return content ? content->type() : typeid(void);
00038     }
00039 
00040     inline Primitive primtype() {
00041         if(type() == typeid(int)) return T_Integer;
00042         else if(type == typeid(long)) return T_Long;
00043         else if(type == typeid(float)) return T_Float;
00044         else if(type == typeid(double)) return T_Double;
00045         else if(type == typeid(bool)) return T_Bool;
00046         else if(type == typeid(Array)) return T_Array;
00047         else if(type == typeid(String)) return T_String;
00048         else if(type == typeid(Dictionary)) return T_Dictionary;
00049         else return FAIL;
00050     }
00051 
00052     Any & operator=(const Any & rhs) {
00053         this->content = rhs.content;
00054     }
00055     template<class T>
00056     Any & operator=(T & value) {
00057         delete this->content;
00058         this->content = new AnyContainer<T>(value);
00059     };
00060 private:
00061 
00062     class AnyContainerBase {
00063     public:
00064 
00065         virtual ~AnyContainerBase() {
00066         }
00067         virtual const std::type_info & type() const = 0;
00068         virtual AnyContainerBase * clone() const = 0;
00069     };
00070 
00071     template<class T>
00072     class AnyContainer : public AnyContainerBase {
00073     public:
00074 
00075         holder(const T & value) : held(value) {
00076         }
00077 
00078         virtual const std::type_info & type() const {
00079             return typeid (T);
00080         }
00081 
00082         virtual AnyContainerBase * clone() const {
00083             return new holder(held);
00084         }
00085 
00086         T held;
00087 
00088     private:
00089         AnyContainer & operator=(const AnyContainer &);
00090 
00091     };
00092 
00093     AnyContainerBase * content;
00094 };
00095 
00096 template<class T> T * any_cast(Any & any) {
00097     check_nullptr(any.contents);
00098     if(!any->type() == typeid(T)) sthrow(InvalidTypeError,
00099             "Tried to assign an Any to an invalid type!");
00100     return static_cast<Any::AnyContainer<T> *>(any.content)->held;
00101 }
00102 SYLPH_END_NAMESPACE
00103 
00104 #endif  /* ANY_H_ */
